title: Liquid Shapes Collection
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 17 Liquid Shapes sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/vBtdX_YTPHo


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Liquid Shape 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Liquid Shape 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Liquid Shape 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Liquid Shape 04_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Liquid Shape 05_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Liquid Shape 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Liquid Shape 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Liquid Shape 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Liquid Shape 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Liquid Shape 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Liquid Shape 11_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Liquid Shape 12_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Liquid Shape 13_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Liquid Shape 14_#[512,288].png 2048x1152
